sections.name: Udyamita Frameworks

frameworks.name: JECP 3xI Framework
frameworks.description: JECP's 3xI framework is a beacon of transformation, centering on Incubation, Innovation, and Inspiration, all rooted in sustainability.

frameworks.name: JECP 7M Framework
frameworks.description: The 7M framework works a lighthouse for Udyamis, guiding them through Mobilization, Mentorship, Market Connect, Money, Miscellaneous Services, Mahol (creating an inspiring environment), and Mitra (partners with complementary skills).

sections.design_notes: Image on one side, text on other, alternating layout

sections.name: Testimonials/Wisdom Section

testimonials.speaker: Dr R. A. Mashelkar
testimonials.title: Padma Vibhushan, Padma Bhushan, Padma Shri
testimonials.quote: The JECP is founded on Jagriti's decade long understanding of enterprise and innovation in the real India. The ecosystem it is creating will take forward ideas of Gandhian Engineering to the masses.

testimonials.speaker: R. Gopalakrishnan
testimonials.title: CEO - Mindworks, Former Director - Tata Sons
testimonials.quote: If in 2008 Jagriti Yatra was at its Gangotri; with the architecture, location and objectives of the JECP, Jagriti is poised at the Sangam...

testimonials.speaker: Dr. Kiran Bedi
testimonials.title: IPS, Former Governor
testimonials.quote: Jagriti Enterprise Centre will lead to women empowerment. Till the time our women are self-reliant, the country can't move to self-reliance.

testimonials.speaker: Shri Ram Nath Kovind
testimonials.title: Hon. President of India 2017
testimonials.quote: This is a great start. Jagriti must continue this enterprise movement and lead it at the national scale.

sections.design_notes: Quote cards with speaker photo, name, title, and quote text

sections.name: Footer

content.about_text: At JECP, you are at the heart of a cutting-edge incubation center dedicated to empowering small and medium enterprises across Tier 2 and 3 districts of India.

contact.address: Jagriti Enterprise Centre - Purvanchal, Vill - Araipar, PO - Barpar, Baitalpur, Deoria, Uttar Pradesh - 274201
